title: IEX shares suffer a shock as Centre pushes for market coupling in power space
summary: Currently, according to the analysts, National Load Dispatch Center (NLDC) is acting as the market coupler – for a very small portion of the market, but now they expect the organisation to become a full-fledged market coupler role.

title: Sugar stocks in a sweet spot, El Nino arrival sparks shortage fears

title: Sula Vineyards hits record high with 10% rally in 3rd straight session in green
summary: Sula Vineyards has reported a strong performance for the full year, with a net profit of Rs 84 crore, up 61% from a year ago. Revenues for FY23 jumped 22% year on year to Rs 553 crore.
